A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney has a knack for ruining everything.  If it's time to break from the past then why buy star wars in the first place.  This movie is awful.  Sure it looks good as they spent a lot of money on it but it lacks everything essential that makes it feel like a star wars movie.  Where is the Sith?  The first order is a joke and they made them a joke.  At no time did I feel that The universe was in peril from destruction.  Grandpa Vader will turn in his grave.
